item.title: Tweet
item.description: Just here to remind folks not to leave Twitter… . . . . . . … Only to join Post It’s the same VC funded, silicon valley bullshit as here. Go #FEDIVERSE ‚ù§Ô∏è 1 | üîÉ 0

item.title: Tweet
item.description: My personal #TwitterMigration has taken another step. Got my archive, which I’ll (eventually) put up somewhere else for funzies. I’ll lurk here for a while, probably post the odd comment or shitpost, but my witty repartee is now entirely reserved for the #Fediverse. Probably. üëã ‚ù§Ô∏è 1 | üîÉ 0
